rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows and a view of the central courtyard; designed in Kerala style with traditional wooden carvings. Accessible entry with wheelchair ramp.
Traditional Kerala kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring open shelves and wooden fixtures. Includes a wheelchair accessible sink and work area.
Open dining area adjacent to the living room and kitchen, offering expansive space for meals and social gatherings.
Master bedroom with a spacious balcony overlooking the garden. Kerala-style interior design with intricate woodwork and natural lighting.
Secondary bedroom with an adjoining balcony designed for relaxation, featuring Kerala traditional elements and ample natural light.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with grab bars and a roll-in shower.
Accessible bathroom serving the second bedroom with essential fixtures and wheelchair-friendly design.
Spacious balcony attached to master bedroom with seating area and decorative elements adhering to Vastu principles.
Balcony attached to second bedroom providing a private outdoor space and garden view.
Central courtyard offering open space for relaxation and light. Integral to the Kerala architectural tradition with water features and garden landscaping.
Large garden area surrounding the property, designed for relaxation and traditional Kerala landscaping including native plants and water bodies.

openings.description: Large, wheelchair accessible main door with traditional Kerala design featuring wood carvings.
Access opening from master bedroom to balcony ensuring smooth transition and adherence to Vastu principles.
Access opening from second bedroom to its adjoining balcony with wide door design for wheelchair accessibility.
